name: Mario
description: Originally a carpenter named Jumpman, this Italian plumber has gone on to become the most recognizable video game character of them all, starring in a veritable pantheon of titles like kart racing and sports.

name: Luigi
description: Luigi is Mario's brother. He began as a simple palette swap of Mario, but was later differentiated. In his later forays, he provides comic relief.

name: Princess Toadstool
description: Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, she is the only one who can break the spell of the evil Koopa king.

name: Toad
description: The Toad is a member of the Toad species. He is a loyal attendant of Princess Peach and often assists Mario on his journeys in a variety of ways.
